member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.AddApplicationMessage
member.summary: Add a user-defined message to the message queue and send that message to debug output.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.AddMessage
member.summary: Add a Direct3D 10 debug message to the message queue and send that message to debug output.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.AddRetrievalFilterEntries
member.summary: Add storage filters to the top of the retrieval-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.AddStorageFilterEntries
member.summary: Add storage filters to the top of the storage-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.ClearRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Remove a retrieval filter from the top of the retrieval-filter stack.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.ClearStorageFilter
member.summary: Remove a storage filter from the top of the storage-filter stack.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.ClearStoredMessages
member.summary: Clear all messages from the message queue.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetBreakOnCategory
member.summary: Get a message category to break on when a message with that category passes through the storage filter.
member.returns: Whether this breaking condition is turned on or off (true for on, false for off).

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetBreakOnID
member.summary: Get a message identifier to break on when a message with that identifier passes through the storage filter.
member.returns: Whether this breaking condition is turned on or off (true for on, false for off).

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetBreakOnSeverity
member.summary: Get a message severity level to break on when a message with that severity level passes through the storage filter.
member.param: Message severity level to break on (see ).
member.returns: Whether this breaking condition is turned on or off (true for on, false for off).

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetMessage
member.summary: Get a message from the message queue.
member.param: Index into message queue after an optional retrieval filter has been applied. This can be between 0 and the number of messages in the message queue that pass through the retrieval filter (which can be obtained with ). 0 is the message at the front of the message queue.
Size of pMessage in bytes, including the size of the message string that the pMessage points to.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetMessageCountLimit
member.summary: Get the maximum number of messages that can be added to the message queue.
member.returns: Maximum number of messages that can be added to the queue. -1 means no limit.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetMuteDebugOutput
member.summary: Get a boolean that turns the debug output on or off.
member.returns: Whether the debug output is on or off (true for on, false for off).

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetNumMessagesAllowedByStorageFilter
member.summary: Get the number of messages that were allowed to pass through a storage filter.
member.returns: Number of messages allowed by a storage filter.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetNumMessagesDeniedByStorageFilter
member.summary: Get the number of messages that were denied passage through a storage filter.
member.returns: Number of messages denied by a storage filter.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetNumMessagesDiscardedByMessageCountLimit
member.summary: Get the number of messages that were discarded due to the message count limit.
member.returns: Number of messages discarded.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetNumStoredMessages
member.summary: Get the number of messages currently stored in the message queue.
member.returns: Number of messages currently stored in the message queue.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetNumStoredMessagesAllowedByRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Get the number of messages that are able to pass through a retrieval filter.
member.returns: Number of messages allowed by a retrieval filter.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Get the retrieval filter at the top of the retrieval-filter stack.
member.param: Retrieval filter at the top of the retrieval-filter stack.
Size of the retrieval filter in bytes. If pFilter is NULL, the size of the retrieval filter will be output to this parameter.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetRetrievalFilterStackSize
member.summary: Get the size of the retrieval-filter stack in bytes.
member.returns: Size of the retrieval-filter stack in bytes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetStorageFilter
member.summary: Get the storage filter at the top of the storage-filter stack.
member.param: Storage filter at the top of the storage-filter stack.
Size of the storage filter in bytes. If pFilter is NULL, the size of the storage filter will be output to this parameter.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.GetStorageFilterStackSize
member.summary: Get the size of the storage-filter stack in bytes.
member.returns: Size of the storage-filter stack in bytes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PopRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Pop a retrieval filter from the top of the retrieval-filter stack.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PopStorageFilter
member.summary: Pop a storage filter from the top of the storage-filter stack.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushCopyOfRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Push a copy of retrieval filter currently on the top of the retrieval-filter stack onto the retrieval-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushCopyOfStorageFilter
member.summary: Push a copy of storage filter currently on the top of the storage-filter stack onto the storage-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushEmptyRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Push an empty retrieval filter onto the retrieval-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushEmptyStorageFilter
member.summary: Push an empty storage filter onto the storage-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushRetrievalFilter
member.summary: Push a retrieval filter onto the retrieval-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.PushStorageFilter
member.summary: Push a storage filter onto the storage-filter stack.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.SetBreakOnCategory
member.summary: Set a message category to break on when a message with that category passes through the storage filter.
member.param: Turns this breaking condition on or off (true for on, false for off).
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.SetBreakOnID
member.summary: Set a message identifier to break on when a message with that identifier passes through the storage filter.
member.param: Turns this breaking condition on or off (true for on, false for off).
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.SetBreakOnSeverity
member.summary: Set a message severity level to break on when a message with that severity level passes through the storage filter.
member.param: Message severity level to break on (see ).
Turns this breaking condition on or off (true for on, false for off).
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.SetMessageCountLimit
member.summary: Set the maximum number of messages that can be added to the message queue.
member.param: Maximum number of messages that can be added to the message queue. -1 means no limit.
member.returns: This method returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue.SetMuteDebugOutput
member.summary: Set a boolean that turns the debug output on or off.
member.param: Disable/Enable the debug output (TRUE to disable or mute the output, FALSE to enable the output).

member.name: ID3D10InfoQueue
member.summary: An information-queue interface stores, retrieves, and filters debug messages. The queue consists of a message queue, an optional storage filter stack, and a optional retrieval filter stack.
